AccountId.description: The unique identifier for the Bing Ads account

TimePeriod.description: The time period for the report data

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code used for monetary values

AdDistribution.description: The distribution network for the ad (search partners, audience network, etc.)

DeviceType.description: The type of device on which the ad was displayed

Network.description: The network on which the ad appeared (e.g., Bing, AOL)

DeliveredMatchType.description: The match type for the delivered ad

DeviceOS.description: The operating system of the device on which the ad was displayed

TopVsOther.description: Indicates whether the ad appeared at the top or other positions

BidMatchType.description: The match type for which the bid was set

AccountName.description: The name of the Bing Ads account

AccountNumber.description: The account number associated with the Bing Ads account

PhoneImpressions.description: The number of impressions that included a phone number

PhoneCalls.description: The number of phone calls generated by the ad

Clicks.description: The total number of clicks on the ad

Ctr.description: The click-through rate for the ad

Spend.description: The total spend on the ad campaign

Impressions.description: The total number of impressions generated by the ad

CostPerConversion.description: The cost per conversion generated by the ad

Ptr.description: The phone-through rate for the ad

Assists.description: The number of assists generated by the ad

ReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend (ROAS) for the ad campaign

CostPerAssist.description: The cost per assist generated by the ad

AverageCpc.description: The average cost per click for the ad

AveragePosition.description: The average position where the ad appeared on the search results page

AverageCpm.description: The average cost per thousand impressions for the ad

Conversions.description: The total number of conversions generated by the ad

ConversionsQualified.description: The number of conversions that met certain criteria

ConversionRate.description: The rate at which clicks on the ad led to conversions

LowQualityClicks.description: The number of low-quality clicks on the ad

LowQualityClicksPercent.description: The percentage of low-quality clicks out of total clicks

LowQualityImpressions.description: The number of low-quality impressions generated by the ad

LowQualitySophisticatedClicks.description: The number of sophisticated clicks recognized as low-quality

LowQualityConversions.description: The number of conversions from low-quality clicks

LowQualityConversionRate.description: The conversion rate for low-quality clicks

Revenue.description: The total revenue generated by the ad

RevenuePerConversion.description: The revenue per conversion generated by the ad

RevenuePerAssist.description: The revenue per assist generated by the ad
